00031 class KviProxy;

00033 class KVILIB_API KviProxyDataBase
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         KviProxyDataBase();
00037         ~KviProxyDataBase();
00038 private:
00039         KviPointerList<KviProxy> * m_pProxyList;
00040         KviProxy                 * m_pCurrentProxy;
00041 public:
00042         void clear();
00043         KviPointerList<KviProxy> * proxyList(){ return m_pProxyList; };
00044         KviProxy * currentProxy(){ return m_pCurrentProxy; };
00045         KviProxy * findProxy(const KviProxy * pProxy, bool bName);
00046         void updateProxyIp(const char * proxy,const char * ip);
00047         void setCurrentProxy(KviProxy * prx){ m_pCurrentProxy = prx; };
00048         void insertProxy(KviProxy * prx){ m_pProxyList->append(prx); };
00049         void load(const QString &filename);
00050         void save(const QString &filename);
